name: Strike Zombie Survival: Real S
description:
Strike Zombie Survival: Real Shooting is #1 first person shooter of eye-popping 3D graphics combined with blood boiling zombie survival strategy game. All survivors are driven by one goal: stay alive as long as you can!
Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Easy simple controls
Horrifying visuals and sound
Different in game missions
Variety of guns
Sniper killing missions included
